text: Dominique Colonna (4 September 1928 - 12 September 2023) was a French footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. Colonna was born in Corte, Haute- Corse.Biography: Colonna, Dominique He played for the French national team from 1957 to 1961 and for the Cameroon national team from 1965 to 1970. He won the Coupe de France in 1958. Colonna died in Corte, France on 12 September 2023, one week after his 95th birthday. ==Honours== Nice * French Championship: 1956 Reims * French Championship: 1958, 1960, 1962 * Coupe de France: 1958 * Troph√©e des champions: 1958 * European Cup: runner-up 1959 ==References== ==Other websites== * Player bio at the official web site of the French Football Federation Category:1928 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Footballers from Corsica Category:French football managers Category:France at the 1958 FIFA World Cup Category:People from Haute-Corse
title: Dominique Colonna
